question: One of my clients just turned 40 last week. She has been diabetic for years and has an irregular period. She and her husband have been told they would never have children. She takes hpt on a regular basis just to make sure, with the irregular period.This week, she took a test and got a BFP! Not expecting it or anything! She and her husband are thrilled! She is going to be closely monitored with her age and diabetes. Her husband is an only child, so this will be her in-law's first grandchild!Just wanted to share a positive and inspiring story!
title: Great story!
